channel.title: [PI] Duel Arena
channel.description:
Everybody knows the duel arena for most PIs. The one where the winner does not get moved to one of the random duel coords, they just sit in the arena and the loser dies and gets sent to the re-spawn coords. Is there any way to fix this? I have searched many tutorials and posts on google, but none of them seem to fix it. I'll post everything that has to do with duel arena.
TradeAndDuel.java - http://pastebin.com/raw.php?i=yM2B62wk
Playerassistant.java - http://pastebin.com/raw.php?i=L1Eu2nu2
Walking.java - http://pastebin.com/raw.php?i=hDQc4Cd4

item.title: [PI] Duel Arena
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

Everybody knows the duel arena for most PIs. The one where the winner does not get moved to one of the random duel coords, they just sit in the arena and the loser dies and gets sent to the re-spawn coords. Is there any way to fix this? I have searched many tutorials and posts on google, but none of them seem to fix it. Iâ€™ll post everything that has to do with duel arena.
